author: wn.com
title: More Hospitals Encourage Mothers to Breasfeed (Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare Inc)
text: (Source: Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare Inc) Courtney Stefany is a first time mother to a five-month-old baby girl and when it comes to nourishing her child, Stefany takes the natural route. 'Everybody in my family breastfed their children and my husband's family as well,' said Stefany. But it wasn't any easy process. Read the article at WCTV.tv distributed by This content was issued by Tallahassee Memorial HealthCare Inc. on the 2015-10-08 and was initially posted on www.tmh.org. It was distributed, unedited and unaltered, by noodls on 2015-10-19 07:39:53 UTC. The original issuer is solely responsible for the accuracy of the information contained therein. (noodl: 30367066)
